兒不嫌母醜，狗不嫌家貧.pinyin: ér bù xián mǔ chǒu ， gǒu bù xián jiā pín
兒不嫌母醜，狗不嫌家貧.definition: a son won't abandon his mother for being ugly, just as a dog won't abandon its owner for being poor (proverb)

兒化.definition: (Chinese phonetics) to rhotacize a syllable final; to apply r-coloring to the final of a syllable

兒化音.definition: (Chinese phonetics) erhua (the sound of the r-coloring of a syllable final)

兒化韻.definition: (Chinese phonetics) syllable final with r-coloring; rhotacized syllable final

兒女.definition: children; sons and daughters; a young man and a young woman (in love)

兒女英雄傳.definition: The Gallant Maid, novel by Manchu-born Qing dynasty writer 文康[Wen2 Kang1]

兒媳婦兒.definition: erhua variant of 兒媳婦|儿媳妇[er2xi2fu4]

兒孫自有兒孫福.pinyin: ér sūn zì yǒu ér sūn fú
兒孫自有兒孫福.definition: younger generations will do all right on their own (idiom)

兒童權利公約.pinyin: ér tóng quán lì gōng yuē
兒童權利公約.definition: Convention on the Rights of the Child (CRC)
